name: PizzaFix
description:
Unboxing is always surprising, especially... if it's a pizza box! And now try to imagine that you don't know what's inside even as... a pizza chef.
PizzaFix is a casual arcade with time-management elements. You have to correct your assistants' mistakes by re-assembling ingredients and occasionally removing something... extra! Remind yourself that you've gotta be quick, unless you feel like arguing with another infuriated client!
